duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage contract information and resolve complex pricing and rebate issues between departments, vendors, customers, and the internal sales force.
Proactively resolves expiring contracts, customer Group Purchasing Organization (GPO)/tier eligibility documentation, and reviews credit/rebill activity.
Plans and implements contract pricing on new customer conversions and existing customer GPO conversions, and analyzes contract audit reports.
Analyzes pricing issues resulting in short-pays and determining appropriate resolution, and supports AR on complex pricing audits from customers and/or GPO's for specific customers.

education_certification.credential: Four-year university degree required; Previous experience in a medical/surgical distribution or manufacturing business (preferred); Advanced Microsoft Excel skills; Experience in Salesforce (preferred)
